RemoveAllObjects.name: RemoveAllObjects
RemoveAllObjects.description: /**Remove all the objects from the current slide.

AddObject.name: AddObject
AddObject.description: Add an object (image, shape or chart) to the current presentation slide.

params.name: oDrawing
params.description: The object which will be added to the current presentation slide.

SetBackground.name: SetBackground
SetBackground.description: Set the background to the current presentation slide.

params.name: oApiFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the presentation slide background.

GetWidth.name: GetWidth
GetWidth.description: Get the slide width in English measure units.

GetHeight.name: GetHeight
GetHeight.description: Get the slide height in English measure units.
